oai_dc:dc.dc:title: An Annotated Corpus of Webtables for Information Extraction Tasks
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Macdonald, Erin
Barbosa, Denilson
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A CSV file (ending in .tab) for each of 28 Freebase relations listing subject-object pairs related through the appropriate predicate. JSON files (ending in .json) for each relation (plus no relation) listing tables and corresponding columns numbers related through the appropriate predicate. An information PDF file (readme.pdf) describing the structure of the two types of files.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Computer and Information Science
